job title: Quantitative Researcher - Derivatives and Relative Value
city state: – New York, New York, United States
job description:
We are seeking an exceptional quantitative researcher with a strong background in data analysis and statistical methods to join our team. In this role, you will navigate the full research process and design sophisticated models to trade a variety of global macro markets. Responsibilities include:
  • Developing systematic trading strategies, from idea generation and data collection to analysis and model creation.
  • Applying advanced modeling techniques and market knowledge to large, novel or unconventional data sets.
  • Opening opportunities to pursue previously unexplored research topics.
Requirements include:
  • An excellent academic record with a bachelor’s or advanced degree in a quantitative discipline.
  • Strong programming skills (Python, Java).
  • Experience working with large data sets.
  • Ability to tackle in-depth research projects and communicate complex ideas clearly.
  • Innate curiosity, resourcefulness and attention to detail.
